txt.en: Talk to Skámash
Sneak into Gris-shâtroful from the back
Defeat Skámash

'Well-done, [placeholder]! I would say both of us have proven to be heroes this day, wouldn't you? To think that this shard came from the tusk which gave King Folca his mortal wound... and in its own way it proved the undoing of the Boar-tribe Orcs who worshipped it! I think Folca would be very pleased about that, [placeholder].\n\n'It is an heirloom of Rohan, but you are welcome to keep it. I have had enough of adventuring, for now, and will return to Aldburg. Perhaps I will add this verse to the songs I sing about King Folca and his campaign against the Orcs. Yes, I will do just that!'
'But none will challenge my leadership of the Boar-tribe now... not with this!'
'This is an heirloom of the Boar-tribe! This is the tusk that slew hated Folca!'
'I will return to the tavern, there to add my new verse. Where will you go? Rivendell? I have never heard of it, is it far from here? Safe travels, [placeholder]!'
'Once it belonged to the Boar-tribe, and was carved with words of power.'
'Tharbag, this prisoner has got something!'
DNT - Blah!
'It was stolen from us by treacherous swine, but now we have it once again!'
'With this tusk-shard I am invincible! Kill the Captain, my boys!'
Tharbag's Orcs have captured Eldmath, and you really should free him... he was holding onto the corrupted tusk-shard when he was taken!
'I will kill you myself! I have nothing to fear from you!'
'As the Great Boar slew Folca, so will I slay you!'
The Orcs that captured Eldmath belong to the Boar-tribe and are led by Tharbag.
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
'The Boar-tribe has lurked in the shadows for too long! With you two as captives, we will at last be seen as the power we deserve!'
Eldmath has run into some trouble while out in the field, and now he has been captured by Orcs. Even worse, he was holding onto the corrupted tusk-shard when he was taken!
'Skámash, watch this one closely. I do not want to tangle with a Captain.'

'Curse that Tharbag, leaving me to deal with you! He is afraid to fight you, I can tell! Pah!'

A cunning light creeps into Skámash's eyes.

'But if I slay you, that will prove I am stronger than Tharbag, and that lot will see I am fit to be the boss, and he is not! Ah, Tharbag, you fool! You have given me just what I need to take your place as leader of the Boar-tribe!'
'Don't take that tone with me, Skámash! Remember I am your leader!'
'What is it?'
'This!'
The Vengeance of Folca has been cleansed of Mordor's corruption!
'You lot, we're going back to Gris-shâtroful!'
Skámash has been left in charge of dealing with you. This will likely prove to be a mistake!
'We don't need that other one. Skámash, take care of it.'
'Go!'
'So you killed Skámash, eh?'
Tharbag triumphantly holds the corrupted tusk-shard
'You did me a favour! That worm has wanted me dead for weeks!'
DNT - Blah!
Instance: Heirloom of the Riddermark
Tharbag has foolishly left a single Orc to deal with you
You have found Eldmath, but the Orcs were alerted to your presence.
Eldmath was taken eastward to Gris-shâtroful
Eldmath is in Gris-shâtroful, waiting to speak with you.
'Don't worry, [placeholder]! I'll find a way to rescue you... somehow!'
'[placeholder]!'
Gris-shâtroful is to the east, and you might be able to drop down from above and surprise the Orcs that captured Eldmath.
'You scared, Tharbag?'
'What? Why...'
'All I have to do is kill you!'
Survive the encounter with Tharbag
Talk to Eldmath
Talk to Tharbag
Remain alert and look for an opportunity to free Eldmath
